TopicTitle: I'm having issues adding custom agencies.

Articles.Content: I wanted to add custom agencies so I installed a mod (it's not technically a mod, it just has an agencies folder in it). I removed the ones I wanted and added one, but when I see that agency offer me a contract their flag/logo is just pure white.

Hard to say what's the issue here without the config you've used to add the agency. Would you mind to post it here?

Also, is the flag you want to use a .png file and where is it located?
Not a flag, an agency that gives you contracts.

On 7/9/2019 at 2:12 AM, Jexpler said:

but when I see that agency offer me a contract their flag/logo is just pure white.

 

13 minutes ago, Jexpler said:

Not a flag, an agency that gives you contracts.

Yes, I know but you told us in the first post, that the flag/logo of the agency is pure white, so there is something wrong in your config file and/or the picture you want to use for their flag/logo. Without sharing more details like the content of the config it's impossible to tell what's wrong.
It's a .dds file just like the the stock logos. I followed this guide: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/114187-adding-custom-agency/

Well, the guide is not very helpful because it will not show us what's actually wrong in the config you've created by following the guide...That's why I'm asking for your config twice already.

Look, I followed the guide as well and this is the result:

Spoiler

Up to this point, is this answer any helpful for you? Probably not, so let me add the actual important details:

This is the config I'm using: 

AGENT
{
    // The name of your agency
    name = SpaceCake
	
	//Titel of your Angency, displayed in game
	title = SpaceCake

    // Description of your agency
    description = More Cake for more Fun

    // Logo URL should be the full path to the image file for the logo (256x160)
    logoURL = CustomAgency/Agencies/cake

    // Logo URL is the full path to the scaled down image for thumbnails (64x40)
    logoScaledURL = CustomAgency/Agencies/cake_small

	mentality = Pioneer
}

This is the folder structure:
